Maciej A. Czyzewski Archive Research Projects Talks About

Owner & Co-Founder

Below is a short list of my projects that I have created. You can find many more recent on GitHub.
retter

A collection of hash functions, ciphers, tools, libraries, and materials related to cryptography & security.

hyhyhy

A tool for creating nice looking HTML5 presentations.

teax

Command line utilities for TeX. Arm yourself with secret powers!

netflam

A community where people can discuss, share interesting links, questions and timely events.

hashbase

A fast, efficient on-disk/in-memory database with many different kind of data structures.

Contributing

Often I join spontaneously to projects, but if you want me to took part in something, please contact.

colors

Smarter defaults for colors on the web.

neovim

Vim-fork focused on extensibility and agility.
